attributes.action: deny anti-science protagonists the use of any invention or device created by science
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anyone found guilty of having anti-science views should have any invention or device denied them if it has any relation to science.

Here's some examples:

1) Antibiotics
2) Airplanes
3) Televisions
4) iPods
5) Computers
6) Electricity
7) Modern medical operating methods
8) All medicines (except maybe herbal remedies).
9) Cars
10) Bikes
11) Modern homes (they will have to live in mud huts).
12) Purified water (they will have to drink out of lakes).
13) Freezers / fridges
14) Tins (as in tinned food).
15) Cellphones

There are many more but that's a start.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
